column1: [[Image:Esse nuquerna.gif|left]]'''''Áre Nuquerna''''' is the name in [[Quenya]] of the thirty-second letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref>{{App|Letters}}
column3: ''The names of the letters''</ref>  In form it is the thirty-first letter ([[Áre]]) inverted.  It is mostly used as a variation
column7: ''The additional letters''</ref> and it represents '''Z'''.  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Oza'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>
